item.description:
THERE WILL BE "NO CSI INSTRUCTION OR PRACTICE" AT THE CARVER DEN THIS EVENING

 

CLASS WILL BE HELD BY MASTER INSTRUCTOR SARAH TEAGLE , THE FOCUS WILL BE  ON THE INTERMEDIATE STEPPERS

 

 

CLASS IS  FOR  STEPPERS AT THE INTERMEDIATE SKILL LEVEL WHO HAVE PARTICIPATED AND INVESTED IN STEPPIN UP THEIR GAME AND ARE READY TO MOVE ON

 

THIS IS TOUR NUMBER 6

 

PLEASE NOTE,  NON TOSOB STEPPERS IN BOSTON INTERESTED IN IMPROVING THEIR DANCE SKILLS WITH A MASTER INSTRUCTOR MAY PARTICIPATE AT THE SAME FEE AS TOSOB MEMBERS.

PROGRESSIVE CLASS FOR INTERMEDIATES
TOTAL COST $30

 

$10 AIRLINE
$20 CLASS
CLASS SIZE IS LIMITED

 

PRIVATE LESSONS WILL BE OFFERED  ON MAY20, 2011 AT A COST OF $40 HOUR  BETWEEN THE HOURS 10 A.M. TO 1 P.M.
AND 2 P.M. TO 5 P.M.

 

STEPPERS ARE ENCOURAGED TO BOOK A PRIVATE 

 

CRITERIA: MUST TAKE A CLASS IN ORDER TO BOOK A PRIVATE
IF YOU DO NOT PLAN ON TAKING A CLASS THEN YOU ARE NOT ELIGIBLE FOR A PRIVATE LESSON, PRIORITY FOR PRIVATES WILL BE TO STEPPERS WHO ARE ACTIVE AND CONTRIBUTE TO AIRLINE EXPENSES.

 

NEW TO STEPPIN?

WELCOME, AND PLEASE JOIN US ON THURSDAY AT THE CARVER DEN FOR LESSONS PROVIDED BY THE CERTIFIED STEPPING INSTRUCTORS SCOTT, TRACEY AND AUDREY (Certified Steppin Instructors)

JOIN US AT OUR MEMORIAL DAY STEPPIN SET AT SLADES 6 TO 10 P.M. ON MONDAY MAY 30, 2011
item.why: TOSOB STEPPERS ARE ADVANCING THEIR DANCE

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Steppin Up Your Game Tour Number 6 Intermediates
